https://tmrev.io/movie/312975-Bad Hunter 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Young man Bahoz goes hunting in rural Kurdistan. He witnesses the rape of a young woman by an older man. He chases the man away and helps the woman to mend her clothes so she can conceal the rape from her family. That evening, Bahoz receives an unexpected visit... Bad Hunter
